title: Random disconnects
body: I've been randomly disconnected in the home screen of league giving me the trying to reconnect pop up. It's also happened to me on during champ select even though my internet is working. Just wondering if anyone else is getting this or just me?

replies.body:
Try giving this a sus first: https://lagreport.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

It can sometimes pin down if the issue is on your end or your ISPs.
